channel.title: Stormpk, StorkPk Client help
channel.description: need a little help here with a client. Problem is when i run the server and then try to connect using the client supplied with the server it wont connect. Ive changed everything that needs to be changed in both the client and the server. All the ip's match all the server numbers match and the clientversion numbers all match but still no connection. Can anyone help me out?

item.title: Stormpk, StorkPk Client help
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“angels0fdeath01, post:6, topic:355643”]Thank you Nemesis!

But now i’ve run into yet another problem!

Now I’ve made all the corrections with the clientversion they all match. Like there supposed to correct?
Now i am recieving a message The Client Has Been Updated. Please Download The Newest One.

I’ve corrected this problem one time before with another client however the same methods i used there are not working on this client. Someone please help?[/quote]
Here’s how to change clientversion

if (reconnecting) streamClass.addByte(1); else streamClass.addByte(0); 
       [b]streamClass.add2ByteInt(5141);[/b]</blockquote>

The bold line is where it sends clientversion ,so just change 5141 to your clientversion

Read full topic

item.title: Stormpk, StorkPk Client help
item.dc:creator: @angels0fdeath01 angels0fdeath01
item.description:
@angels0fdeath01 wrote:

Thank you Nemesis!

But now i’ve run into yet another problem!

Now I’ve made all the corrections with the clientversion they all match. Like there supposed to correct?
Now i am recieving a message The Client Has Been Updated. Please Download The Newest One.

I’ve corrected this problem one time before with another client however the same methods i used there are not working on this client. Someone please help?

Read full topic

item.title: Stormpk, StorkPk Client help
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

You must change the ip from GameWindowMiddleMan.java on clientside. Same with clientversion.

Read full topic

item.title: Stormpk, StorkPk Client help

item.description:
@massacrerunescape wrote:

angels0fdeath01:

need a little help here with a client. Problem is when i run the server and then try to connect using the client supplied with the server it wont connect. Ive changed everything that needs to be changed in both the client and the server. All the ip’s match all the server numbers match and the clientversion numbers all match but still no connection. Can anyone help me out?

You set it all to localhost?
